episodes.title: Andrew's been caught out in a lie on a global scale - he's to blame for the Royals’ worst year EVER
episodes.description: 2025 has been a turbulent year for the British Royal Family - with the historic removal of Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's royal titles, Prince Harry's ongoing row over security in the UK, Meghan Markle's new brand and project launches and the health updates from King Charles and Princess Catherine. The Sun's Royal Editor Matt Wilkinson, alongside former press secretary to Queen Elizabeth II Ailsa Anderson and 5News' royal correspondent Simon Vigar look back at the biggest royal stories of the year and look ahead to what we can expect from the royals in 2026. 0:48 - Introduction: A Royal Year 1:36 - A Devastating, Sad, Yet Hopeful 2025 for the Royals 2:54 - The Disgrace of Andrew is the Overarching Story of the Year 3:29 - Why 2025 has been the Worst Year for the Royals 4:21 - Andrew's Epstein Scandal: An Existential Threat to the Monarchy 7:00 - Does 2025 Draw a Line Under The Andrew Saga? 8:26 - Prince Harry's Legal Battle For UK Armed Security: Could He Win? 10:21 - Why Should UK Taxpayers Pay For Harry's Security When He Chose to Leave? 12:55 - Will Harry Bring His Children Back to the UK in 2026? 13:14 - Meghan's Entrepreneurial Year: Is Her Cultural Relevancy Running Out? 16:00 - How Successful Will Meghan's Return to Acting Be? 18:51 - Campaign To Remove Duchess of Sussex's Title 19:32 - The Royals That Will Shine in 2026 21:19 - The King Completes More Engagements Than Any Other Royal 28:34 - Quickfire Questions Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Royals BANISHED Andrew to get ahead of Epstein Files - but there’s lots more to come out
episodes.description:
We examine Prince Andrew’s ongoing Epstein scandal, described as a new “nightmare before Christmas,” as damaging revelations continue to surface and place renewed pressure on King Charles and Prince William. We also break down Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s Archewell Philanthropies rebrand, exploring what the Sussex strategy signals for their public image, finances, and long-term relationship with the monarchy.

Plus, we look at a rare feel-good royal moment as Prince George follows in the footsteps of Princess Diana and Prince William, volunteering at a homeless shelter during the Christmas period. From royal scandals to symbolic acts of service, this episode unpacks what it all means for the future of the British Royal Family in 2025.

Chapters:
00:00 Prince Andrew Epstein Scandal Returns: Royal Crisis Before Christmas
01:28 King Charles and Prince William Push Andrew Aside
02:41 Sandringham Controversy: Epstein Claims and Royal Estates
05:53 Prince William Body Language Signals Final Split
08:12 Sarah Ferguson and Epstein Money Fallout
09:44 Beatrice and Eugenie in a Slimmed-Down Monarchy
12:44 Prince Andrew Loses Firearms Licence
15:10 Harry and Meghan’s Archewell Rebrand Struggles
23:25 Prince George and Princess Diana Legacy Link
29:00 King Charles Christmas Message and Royal Traditions
